name: Java Rubics Cube (Yes I know it is "Rubik's" and not Rubics)
name_original: Java Rubics Cube (Yes I know it is "Rubik's" and not Rubics)
description:
I made a 3D  Rubik's cube using Java ...

Mix and Reset buttons are available for your convenience (yes I am thoughtful like that).

To rotate the Rubik's cube, you can use the Q, W, E, A , S , and D keys.

Shift key can be used to reverse aforementioned rotations.

Camera movements are possible using mouse right click/left click while dragging mouse.

 Scroll wheel can be used to zoom in and out.

note** specific instructions can be found inside the game itself.
